statements: SELECT * FROM content_localization;
SELECT id, language_code FROM content_localization WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT id, translated_text, cultural_adaptions FROM content_localization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM content_localization WHERE language_code = 'fr' AND id > 5;
SELECT id, language_code, translated_text FROM content_localization ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM content_localization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, language_code, translated_text FROM content_localization WHERE language_code = 'en' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, language_code, translated_text FROM content_localization WHERE language_code = 'fr' AND LENGTH(translated_text) > 100;
SELECT id, language_code, translated_text, translated_images FROM content_localization WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, language_code, cultural_adaptions FROM content_localization WHERE translated_text IS NOT NULL AND language_code LIKE 'es%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Translation WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT id, translated_text FROM Translation WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT content_id, language_code, image_url FROM Translation WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM CulturalAdaptation WHERE culture_code = 'fr';
SELECT adaptation_description, audio_url FROM CulturalAdaptation WHERE content_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Translation WHERE content_id = 100;
SELECT translated_text, language_code FROM Translation WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY language_code DESC;
SELECT id, culture_code, adaptation_description FROM CulturalAdaptation WHERE content_id = 200 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Translation INNER JOIN CulturalAdaptation ON Translation.content_id = CulturalAdaptation.content_id WHERE Translation.language_code = 'en' AND CulturalAdaptation.culture_code = 'en-US';

SELECT id, content_id, culture_code, translated_text FROM Translation LEFT JOIN CulturalAdaptation ON Translation.content_id = CulturalAdaptation.content_id WHERE content_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE content_id = 1;
SELECT translation_id, translated_text FROM translations WHERE language_code = 'en' ORDER BY translation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM images WHERE image_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT image_id, image_url, caption FROM images WHERE image_id = 5;
SELECT adaptation_id, adaptation_text FROM cultural_adaptations WHERE cultural_context LIKE '%tradition%';
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE language_code = 'en' ORDER BY translation_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT translation_id, translated_text FROM translations WHERE content_id = 123 AND language_code = 'fr' ORDER BY translation_id;
SELECT image_url, caption FROM images WHERE caption LIKE '%beautiful%' AND content_id = 456;
SELECT content_id, adaptation_text FROM cultural_adaptations WHERE content_id IN (SELECT content_id FROM translations WHERE language_code = 'es');
SELECT DISTINCT language_code FROM translations ORDER BY language_code ASC;
SELECT * FROM TranslatedText WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, text_content FROM TranslatedText WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT id, image_data FROM TranslatedImage WHERE language_code = 'fr';
SELECT * FROM CulturalAdaptions WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, content_data FROM LocalizedContent WHERE language_code = 'de' AND content_type = 'news';
SELECT * FROM TranslatedText ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT language_code, text_content FROM TranslatedImage WHERE language_code='en' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM CulturalAdaptions WHERE language_code IN ('en', 'fr') LIMIT 10 OFFSET 5;
SELECT id, content_type FROM LocalizedContent WHERE content_type='article' ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, language_code, cultural_info FROM CulturalAdaptions WHERE id=100;
SELECT * FROM translated_text;
SELECT text_content FROM translated_text WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT image_url FROM translated_image WHERE image_id = 3;
SELECT cultural_details FROM cultural_adaption WHERE adaption_id = 1;
SELECT content_type, create_date FROM content_metadata WHERE content_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM translated_text WHERE text_id = 1;
SELECT text_id, text_content FROM translated_text WHERE language_code = 'en';
SELECT * FROM content_metadata ORDER BY create_date DESC;
SELECT adaption_id, cultural_details FROM cultural_adaption WHERE adaption_id > 5;
SELECT content_type, create_date FROM content_metadata WHERE content_type LIKE '%article%' LIMIT 10;
